title: Empowering the Next Generation of Leaders
summary: This brochure provides an overview of Citi and the Citi Foundation’s engagement with Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCUs) since 1963. We have included highlights of our support of HBCUs to illuminate how Citi and the Citi Foundation are making progress to help close the racial wealth gap in the U.S.
tag-1: Empowering the Next Generation of Leaders
